name: MOTHER NIRMALA FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Mother Nirmala Foundation Farrukhabad uttar Pradesh India is a Non Political Organization It has Been Established on Day 28 Month September and Year 2010 by The journal Meeting Act Farrukhabad up on NGO Office This NGO Format According to The Willingness of The Community People in a View to Deal With The Present Socio-economic problems Each Other and To Find out The Best Way of The Solving The Problems Through Free discussion and People Participation and The Discussion Making and get-together under umbrella of Mother Nirmala Foundation Farrukhabad Organization.The Mother Nirmala Foundation Farruklhabad Up Working and assist The Needy and neglected People at Grass Root Level and find access to Sustain in The Society with The Dignity.
